mapper.select:
select bu_member_info(member_name, member_phone, member_price, member_type_id, member_discount, remark, status, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time)
from bu_member_info where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into bu_member_info(member_name, member_phone, member_price, member_type_id, member_discount, remark, status, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberPrice}, #{memberTypeId}, #{memberDiscount}, #{remark}, #{status}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})

insert into bu_member_info(member_name, member_phone, member_price, member_type_id, member_discount, remark, status, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.memberName}, #{entity.memberPhone}, #{entity.memberPrice}, #{entity.memberTypeId}, #{entity.memberDiscount}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into bu_member_info(member_name, member_phone, member_price, member_type_id, member_discount, remark, status, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.memberName}, #{entity.memberPhone}, #{entity.memberPrice}, #{entity.memberTypeId}, #{entity.memberDiscount}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update member_name = values(member_name), member_phone = values(member_phone), member_price = values(member_price), member_type_id = values(member_type_id), member_discount = values(member_discount), remark = values(remark), status = values(status), del_flag = values(del_flag), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update bu_member_info
member_name = #{memberName},
member_phone = #{memberPhone},
member_price = #{memberPrice},
member_type_id = #{memberTypeId},
member_discount = #{memberDiscount},
remark = #{remark},
status = #{status},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
